entity.name: ListObservedValue
entity.description: An observation for which the value is a list of strings.

entity.name: DecimalObservedValue
entity.description: An observation for which the value is a decimal number.

entity.name: IntegerObservedValue
entity.description: An observation for which the value is an integer number.

entity.name: XrefObservedValue
entity.description: An observation for which the value refers to a Concept in the database.
